item.description: https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/Eldath
About The face of The Syndicate AKA “The Lady of the long night” The puppet queen Mystress of Shadows Malice General Bad-bitch The Raven Queen(?) Events
https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/Lathander
Mardred Blutgard

About Race: Kitsune Apparel: Black Armour Weapons: Silver Bow From: Mitz “The best courier in all the north” Events Breeze was used by the syndicate to trap the Cradle Snatchers for payment for their ill sister’s treatment.
About Dead like anus - Qidan
About Avatar of the god of magic. Located at Stronghold - Master of secrets. Has died and been ressurected. Events Killed by Rillathane Used to love Rillathane
About Mech from the mech releam former Pirate of the Astral Sea

About Vamipre kin from Bathumhold . Well know traders of trinkets and hard to find items Members Lucinda Du Pontif Nathanial Du Pontif Vampire Children (Annoying shits) Events Offered us a Ring of Misspelling

About Little Wolf kin / Fully grown wolfkin due to a time crystal and branching paths. Events Last seen by the party when he travelled back in time to see his father. He then broke the one rule that he stayed behind and basically broke the whole of Space and Time. But that wont come back to bite us… There are now two Fangs, Old Fang who went back in time and a Fang which decided not to go back in time.
“Insemination in the Ranks” About Lead the attack on Ghost against The Marquis . Aggressive but pat-able
About Leader of a Hag coven of three (all bar one is dead name to be confirmed) Geralt of Rivania used to be a servant of Granny Dead

NPCs Breeze Canus Corellien Cosine Du Pontif’s Fang Granny General Howlington La Qua Lady Xiao Lord Bovi Lord Itcis Merryweather Murray Destroyer of Worlds Percival Pibbles Pink Panther Portobello Pete Ratkin Rillathane Saraki The Matron The Marquis
About DEAD - Badger Hill by Archibald BUT BUT BUT WHAT ABOUT THE MANNERISMS

About Member of The Syndicate Has a a tail which is long and thin and can pick up items like a monkey Events Trapped us at badger hill We have to sneakily get into her mansion Other Archibald has a connection to her (hit list?)
About Member of The Syndicate Minotaur Lord of the Hylyllian Empire
About Unknown!
About Our Quest Giver. Loves Corellien

About A talking skull met at Ghost now worn on winters belt “Evil in the sense that he is undead but not actually evil” Died at a dark elven war. (unsure if true) Says he is Human king (This is a lie) There was no Human King called Murray. Questions Who is Murray?
About Owner of Badger Hill Pug boy Caretaker of Griffins New member of the Stronghold

About Fey Creature - Adorable Appearance Hedgehog-kin in a suit and usually in a position requiring the parties help Events Feyrealm an escort mission with a group of hedgehogs to a local village and defended them against some blink dogs. The party then gave Pibbles alot of gold and suggested him to the local Authority that a life of politics may suit him. For which he ditched his counterparts (It’s ok they robbed the party after in the Hedgeshot) Water realm, Pibbles is now the advisor to a Fayreleam’s diplomat, who under the control of a mind flayer murders them with cold blood.

About Met in the plane of insanity Had a dead cat, bat, camel and fish as a pet Dead Events Used a grande to kill a member of the royalty with in the plane of insantiy Documents came to light that Pigwings was a secret agent man (more clarity needed)
About Butler of the Stronghold usually accompained by the Pink Panther theme. Totally bad ass in combat.
About Mushoom being. Used to hang around corpses of dark rituals Best Friend of Qidan . Likely a stoner vision or imaginary friend. Probably not real…
About I think they are dead lol
About Member of The Syndicate Avatar of Nature Dead - Killed by the Cradle Snatchers
About Lord of the Dark Elves. Dead Member of The Syndicate Events Caused a massive rift bringing deamons and nightmare fuel into Elunore when a vote for War on Cradle
About Member of The Syndicate Has a beak but not Arrakoa Can control animals Is a Rackshasa Resides with in the capital city of Ghost
About [[Fang]]’s Mother. Banged by Naberus
About Has a tattoo of a octopus with 8 guns on his butt
About Kenku Bard. Now works in the Tarvern of Forever
About MIA
About Killed by Granny
About A Orc Blood Hunter now Military Advisor for the Cradle Snatchers
About Hill Dwarf Barbarian. Asended to a god after a trail infront of the Dwarven Gods.
About MIA

About Class - Spore Druid From - Ofheise Backstory: Part of a drudic clan which resided in the forests northwest of Ofheise was cast out for being lazy and focused on the darker parts of druidic craft focusing on spores and decay instead of life and rejuvenation. Qidan was cast out at 14 left as a Lonely teenage firbolg outside the city of the elves. Qidan was picked up/hoodwinked by Saraki and used to dispose of bodies of failed rituals for Lolth .
About Little Fox boyo
